title: Ex-OpenAI CTO's Efficient AI Startup
summary: Mira Murati's $2B seed round at $12B valuation, focused on efficient customizable models with Tinker tool

content.whatItIs: Founded by former OpenAI CTO Mira Murati, Thinking Machines Lab focuses on making AI models more efficient and customizable. One of the largest seed rounds in Silicon Valley history.
howItWorks: Founded by ex-OpenAI CTO Mira Murati after her surprise departure in September 2025
$2B seed round at $12B valuation within first 5 months—one of largest seed rounds ever
Focus on efficient, customizable models rather than raw scale
Launched Tinker: tool that simplifies fine-tuning open models using techniques like LoRA (Low-Rank Adaptation)
Positioning as alternative to 'scale is all you need' approach
Team includes other former OpenAI researchers
content.coreInsight: The 'efficient AI' thesis: rather than building ever-larger models, focus on making models more efficient and easier to customize. Tinker democratizes fine-tuning for enterprises that need tailored models.
content.keyMetrics: $2B seed round at $12B valuation in 5 months. One of the largest seed rounds in Silicon Valley history.
